column2: 3 US boxers punched out of Games
column3: Athens -- Vanes Martirosyan became the second American to bow out of the Olympic boxing tournament Thursday when he was defeated 20-11 by Lorenzo Aragon of Cuba in their welterweight bout at 152 pounds.

column3: With the much-ballyhooed initial public offering of Google behind them and oil chugging to a new record high, investors took a step back today.
